alert.note: Alert for Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 13 at 10:50AM EST until January 13 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON FOR SOUTH CENTRAL CUMBERLAND, SOUTHEASTERN YORK AND EAST CENTRAL ROCKINGHAM COUNTIES... At 1050 AM EST, Tide gauges indicate major coastal flooding developing across the warned area. Heavy rainfall is also occurring based on radar and spotter reports. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding from high tide levels...battering waves and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Tide Gauges and Spotters. IMPACT...Life threatening coastal flooding with high water levels and battering surf. Heavy rainfall is producing freshwater flooding as well. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Biddeford, Portsmouth, Hampton, Rye, Kittery, Saco, Kennebunk, Cape Elizabeth, Kennebunkport, Wells and York. This includes the following Recreation Locations... Hampton Beach, York Beach, Ogunquit Beach, Wells Beach, Fortunes Rock Beach, Higgins Beach, Crescent Beach State Park and Scarborough Beach State Park. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Move away from the shore to higher ground. Do not attempt sightseeing of the water and surf. Do not drive through flooded roadways.
